/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, giving a driver's perspective of the journey. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. On either side of the highway, lush green trees stretch out, providing a natural border to the scene. In the distance, power lines can be seen running parallel to the road, a common sight in urban landscapes. A white van is visible on the road, moving towards the right side of the image, adding a sense of motion to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the journey, looking up at the road ahead. The overall composition of the image gives a sense of a typical day in a bustling city like Beijing.
